name: Night Striders #103
description: This striking image depicts two futuristic warriors in an otherworldly desert landscape, illuminated by the soft glow of a large moon. Their faces are adorned with intricate metallic patterns and glowing circuitry, and their eyes are a captivating purple hue. They wear sleek, armored suits with glowing green accents, suggesting a blend of advanced technology and a fierce spirit. The desert's rugged terrain is highlighted in the background, adding to the feeling of resilience and strength.

attributes.value: Desert landscape under a moonlit sky
The second figure in the background, similar in appearance
Desert with distant cacti and a glowing moon
